https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/agoyhbjPUsPZH7kBBK445RjingQ.jpg With the holidays approaching, a young party planner arranges a special Christmas party for a New York toy store. When a powerful corporation threatens to shut her down, she decides to follow her heart, moving forward with the party plans and finding true love in time for Christmas. Best Christmas Party Ever
